title: Chicken Soup for the Father & Daughter Soul: Stories to Celebrate the Love Between Dads and Daughters Through the Years
description: An inspirational anthology of stories and reflections celebrate diverse aspects of the loving relationships between fathers and their daughters as they evolve from infancy through the later years, in a collection that includes sections on childhood, the trials of adolescence, the poignant time of leaving home to become independent, and the years when daughters become caretakers. Original. 200,000 first printing.
author: Jack Canfield
